word_mean: 颅骨：由头面骨组成的骨架，其中包含筛骨、额骨、舌骨、泪骨、鼻骨、枕骨、腭骨、顶骨、蝶骨、颞骨、颧骨及下鼻甲、上颌骨、下颌骨和犁骨
头部覆盖脑实质的骨骼，由左右顶骨和部分额骨、枕骨构成。

sentence.Network_en: He has received extensive corrective surgery to his skull.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的头骨做过大面积的矫形手术。

sentence.Network_en: The patient's brain activity is monitored via electrodes taped to the skull.
sentence.Network_cn: 病人的大脑活动通过固定在其头骨上的电极进行监控。

sentence.Network_en: He had already clipped his hair close to the skull.
sentence.Network_cn: 他已经把头发剪得贴头皮了。

entry.def: Your skull is the bony part of your head which encloses your brain.
